topic.title: Online radio station AliceRadio
topic.body:
Hello friends! 
Let me ivite you to my personal online radiostation. 
It's mixed-genre streaming station with CC (mostly) music. Follow us, Love us, Enjoy us!
https://www.aliceradio.space

1571500913_1KoioT6zYAXhg2NvChNtZvSU7fx5F.body: No, go to hell, freaky pedophile

1576002321_17ZnSRGrALWLigjaDhkzUM4KAC8c8.body: Utopia is closed proprietory scum shit, don't use it

1576069034_12ytyx8zmYMn58UavemioxPnMwaDN.body: UPD: if you making a music and want to see it on air on AliceRadio, contact me with ZeroMail (n3uronmaster), and I will publish it.

> [styromaniac](#comment_1417_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You aren't hosting the music through ZeroNet?

No yet, but I'm loking about how to do it, soon I will make a ZeroNet clone of main site, that hosted on Big Internet.

1576214481_1G9k2b4cSRzZSfLQuzxmpJB3LT3Gf.body: stop bringing your hate here please

1576442383_1PDryjn9XzJ6pR6M98ST8EvdYheXV.body: Sorry, but it sounds like cryptoscum with no pay guarantee and no base for making profit. It's look like MLM-csum with cryptocurrency. You asking not to use exchangers, only personal wallets so user cant stop transaction or dispute it.

1577105495_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body: lold so hard. Pitty schoolboy think he is so elitared

1576862108_1Drej4kKBea1TryGPYfVZgzDxaB71.body: Of course I heared. Great Mongolian Empire with Chingis Khan, yes. They were really great.
